SEARCH
Package JEST.controller

Interface GameController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleController, GUIController
public interface GameController
Interface that defines all interactions between the game and the user. This allows switching between console and graphical interface implementations.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    GameController.MessageType
    Message type for display.

  • Method Details

    • askNewOrLoadGame

      int askNewOrLoadGame()
      Ask the user to start a new game or load an existing one.
      Returns:
      1 for new game, 2 for load game

    • askNumberOfPlayers

      int askNumberOfPlayers()
      Ask for the number of players.
      Returns:
      the number of players (3 or 4)

    • askIsVirtualPlayer

      boolean askIsVirtualPlayer(int playerNumber)
      Ask if a player is virtual.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player number
      Returns:
      true if virtual, false otherwise

    • askFirstName

      String askFirstName(int playerNumber)
      Ask for the first name of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player number
      Returns:
      the first name

    • askLastName

      String askLastName(int playerNumber)
      Ask for the last name of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player number
      Returns:
      the last name

    • askStrategy

      String askStrategy(int playerNumber)
      Ask for the strategy of a virtual player.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player number
      Returns:
      "1" for random, "2" for defensive, "3" for aggressive

    • displayPlayerCreated

      void displayPlayerCreated(int playerNumber, String firstName, String lastName, boolean isVirtual)
      Display a message about player creation.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player number
      firstName - the first name
      lastName - the last name
      isVirtual - true if virtual player

    • displayTrophyCards

      void displayTrophyCards(List<Card> trophyCards)
      Display the trophy cards.
      Parameters:
      trophyCards - the trophy cards

    • askMakeOffer

      int askMakeOffer(Player player, String jest, Card c1, Card c2)
      Ask a player to make an offer.
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the offer
      jest - the player's current jest
      c1 - first card
      c2 - second card
      Returns:
      the index of the card to show (1 or 2)

    • askChooseOffer

      int[] askChooseOffer(Player player, String jest, List<Player> availablePlayers)
      Ask a player to choose an offer.
      Parameters:
      player - the player choosing
      jest - the player's current jest
      availablePlayers - the list of players with available offers
      Returns:
      an array with [playerIndex, cardChoice] where cardChoice is 1 for face-up, 2 for face-down

    • displayCardAddedToJest

      void displayCardAddedToJest(Player player, Card card)
      Display the card added to a player's jest.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      card - the card added

    • displayWinner

      void displayWinner(String ranking)
      Display the final ranking and winner.
      Parameters:
      ranking - the ranking as a string

    • askSaveGame

      boolean askSaveGame()
      Ask if the user wants to save the game.
      Returns:
      true to save, false otherwise

    • askSaveFileName

      String askSaveFileName()
      Ask for the save file name.
      Returns:
      the file name

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage(String message, GameController.MessageType type)
      Display a message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display
      type - the type of message (NORMAL, INFORMATION, ERROR)

    • askSelectFileToLoad

      int askSelectFileToLoad(List<String> fileNames)
      Ask the user to select a file to load.
      Parameters:
      fileNames - the list of available files
      Returns:
      the index of the selected file
